Package math

Class MatrixHelper

java.lang.Object
math.MatrixHelper
public class MatrixHelper
extends java.lang.Object
This function handles functions manipulating matrices

  • Method Details

    • identity

      public static Matrix4x4 identity()
      This function returns an identity Matrix4x4
      Returns:
      an identity Matrix4x4

    • determinant3x3

      public static float determinant3x3​(float m00, float m01, float m02, float m10, float m11, float m12, float m20, float m21, float m22)
      This function returns the determinant of a 3x3 matrix
      Parameters:
      m00 - the 0 row 0 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m01 - the 0 row 1 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m02 - the 0 row 2 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m10 - the 1 row 0 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m11 - the 1 row 1 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m12 - the 1 row 2 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m20 - the 2 row 0 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m21 - the 2 row 1 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      m22 - the 2 row 2 column element of the 3x3 matrix
      Returns:
      the determinant of the 3x3 matrix

    • getTranslationMatrix

      public static Matrix4x4 getTranslationMatrix​(float x, float y, float z)
      This function calculates and returns a translation Matrix4x4 with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      x - 0 row 3 column element of the matrix
      y - 1 row 3 column element of the matrix
      z - 2 row 3 column of the matrix
      Returns:
      the translation Matrix4x4 with the given parameters

    • getScaleMatrix

      public static Matrix4x4 getScaleMatrix​(float x, float y, float z)
      This function calculates and returns a scale matrix with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      x - 0 row 0 column element of the matrix
      y - 1 row 1 column element of the matrix
      z - 2 row 2 column element of the matrix
      Returns:
      returns a Matrix4x4 with x,y,z,1 on the main diagonal

    • getRotationMatrix

      public static Matrix4x4 getRotationMatrix​(float x, float y, float z)
      This function calculates and returns a rotation matrix with the given parameters Rotation matrix is calculated by multiplying 3 matrices:
      Parameters:
      x - parameter to calculate 11,12,21,22 elements of the first matrix
      y - parameter to calculate 00,02,20,22 elements of the second matrix
      z - parameter to calculate 00,01,10,11 elements of the third matrix
      Returns:
      the rotation Matrix4x4 calculated with the given parameters

    • getProjectionMatrix

      public static Matrix4x4 getProjectionMatrix​(float FOV, float aspectRatio, float zFar, float zNear)
      This function calculates and returns the projection matrix for given parameters of a camera
      Parameters:
      FOV - the field of view
      aspectRatio - the aspect ratio
      zFar - the maximum view distance
      zNear - the minimum view distance
      Returns:
      the projection Matrix4x4 for given parameters of a camera

    • cos

      public static float cos​(float x)
      This function returns the cosines of a float
      Parameters:
      x - the float for which to calculate the cosines
      Returns:
      the cosines of the given parameter

    • sin

      public static float sin​(float x)
      This function returns the sinus of a float
      Parameters:
      x - the float for which to calculate the sinus
      Returns:
      the sinus of the given parameter

      public static float tan​(float x)
      This function returns the tangents of a float
      Parameters:
      x - the float for which to calculate the tangents
      Returns:
      the tangents of the given parameter
